about_the_game:
Your purchase directly supports our ongoing development efforts for future updates and exciting new content. As a token of our gratitude for your generous support, you'll enjoy the following perks:

  • Exclusive in-game leaderboards
  • Game wallpapers, as well as other art assets.(can be viewed in the game root directory.)
  • Experience more special in-game additions as game updates.
  • There may be more benefits in the future, so stay tuned.

    Your support means the world to us!

    Developer Notes:
    This game is inspired by Exit 8. You are free to create, upload, and monetize videos and any other content featuring Game on platforms such as YouTube, Twitch, and other video-sharing websites. The characters, places, and elements involved in the game are fictitious. Any resemblance to actual persons, living or dead, or events is purely coincidental.

English, Simplified Chinese*, French, Italian, German, Russian, Hungarian, Turkish, Czech, Japanese, Polish, Traditional Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Spanish - Latin America, Korean
